definition: office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

sentences.english: At that time, Chen Xiang had made the County Civil Affairs Bureau director.
sentences.chinese: 那時候，陳響已經做了縣民政局局長了。

sentences.english: Directed by the Scientific Institution, the society is a corporate body registered in Bureau of Civil Affairs.
sentences.chinese: 屬市政府科協主管，市民政局註冊的法人社團組織。

sentences.english: Visit China Association of Social Workers and met the Ministry of Civic Affairs.
sentences.chinese: 拜訪中國社工協會並與民政局副局長會面。

sentences.english: The Lius are not alone in choosing not to officially register their union with the local marriage bureau.
sentences.chinese: 劉並非惟一選擇不踏入民政局正式登記結婚的老人。

definition: to obtain a certificate or license etc/(PRC) to obtain a marriage license/to marry
public security bureau (government office similar in function to a police station)
Ministry of Civil Affairs (MCA) of the PRC
population (counted as number of households for census or taxation)/registered residence/residence permit/(in Hong Kong and Macau) bank account
planned childbirth/birth control/family planning/abbr. for 計劃生育|计划生育
